string.value: You'd better check in to see the progress The Rememberer of Sleepywood is making with his research on the strange mushrooms.

The Rememberer has completed his research, and has suggested that there may be some Horny Mushrooms that have been tainted. He's asked you to gather some Tainted Horny Mushroom Caps.


#i4032390:# #t4032390:# #c4032390# / 20

The Rememberer told you that his study of the Horny Mushrooms has been completed, but that he still can't understood the vague mushroom signals. He told you he still doesn't know what drove the mushrooms into a rage.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 8,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Zombie Mushroom Signal 1' quest\r\n

I just completed my research on the Horny Mushrooms, and… Well, it looks like some of these Horny Mushrooms are tainted. The tainted Horny Mushroom Caps look like this #v4032390#. If you can gather these up, it would really speed up the research. Can you do that for me?
Thank you. I need 20 Tainted Horny Mushroom Caps.
I am sorry. I must be working you too hard. I understand.
Oh! You brought them all! Great, now once I take this and do that, and…

I've been studying the signals that the Horny Mushrooms send to each other and figured out what some of them mean.\r\n#b‘Danger'#k , #b‘King Pepe'#k, #b‘Level 30'#k\r\nThis is still a big mystery to me…
I'm currently studying the Horny Mushrooms...
